instructions: Mix flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt in a bowl.
Add milk, egg, and melted butter to the dry ingredients.
Pour batter onto a hot greased griddle.
Cook until bubbles form on the surface, then flip and cook until golden brown.

recipes.title: HAMBURGER
recipes.description: hamm hamm hamm gur gur gur
instructions: Season ground beef with salt and pepper.
Form beef into patties and grill for 4-5 minutes per side.
Toast burger buns on the grill.
